std::string message() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns an explanatory message for the stored error value and error category. Effectively calls {{c|category().message(value())}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
An explanatory message for the stored error value and error category. 

{{cpp/impldef exception}}
